scripts.dev: printf '\033[95mRunning application in development mode\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose up --build
scripts.prod: printf '\033[95mRunning application in production mode\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml up --build
scripts.down: printf '\033[95mRemoving docker containers and volumes\033[0m' && echo ... && docker compose down -v
